TopicTitle: So It appears I have 2 Buzz Kermans

Articles.Content: Which one will get to the Mun first?

Seconding the above, for fun and profit.

Better still, wait for a third one to appear, then design a lander based around the three-man capsule and send all of them in one mission.

I can imagine this conversation going on at the Astronaut Lounge.

Buzz 1: Hey, how you doing? You're that guy from the flight training, aren't you? I got assigned to Kerpollo 11

Buzz 2: Why, so am I! Nice to meet you, fellow, my name is Buzz and I'm your Command Module pilot.

Buzz 1: My name is Buzz too!

Buzz 2: But-but, you can't be Buzz, I'm Buzz

Buzz 1: I'm Buzz

Buzz 2: Nuh-uh

Buzz 1: Uh-huh

Buzz 2: Nuh-uh

Buzz 1: Uh-huh

Buzz 3: Shut up, you idiots! I'm Buzz, and I'm your LM pilot for Kerpollo 11!

Buzz 1: That makes me your commander. Change your names, since I'm Buzz

WARNING

TIMESPAVE PARADOX DETECTED

KERBIN NOW SUCK TO BLACK HOLE

KSP HAS CRASHED
I've rolled three Luke Kermans between my two saves. What I'd really like is two Orly Kermans, got the first one on Friday.

Haha nice.

But my eye is inexplicably drawn to Billy-Bobdan Kerman. Looks like someone tried to name their child after the two heroes Bill and Bob and messed up, hehe.
Dont worry too much about it.... They will die soon enough
Put the two Buzzes in the same capsule and see if they survive.
It's all a bit like this Monty Python skit
Are you certain they are not the same Buzz? Perhaps you will opened a temporal rift somewhere in the system, in the future, and send him back in time so it appears there are 2!
Time for the Thunderdome - two Buzz enter, one Buzz leaves

I had two kerbal with same name during 0.20, I thought. Once I lanedd one of them next to the other on the moon and I let them meet in the capsule. The map showed there was only one of them. They should never meet each other.
Even though kerbals inbreed the [negative connotation] out of themselves and they're actually identical plant-men that reproduce with spores (theory), they're not the same kerbals.
